relation: Define the picture settings. More details. Horizontal alignment can be 'l', 'r', or 'c', for left, right and center. Vertical alignment can be 't', 'b', or 'c', for top, bottom and center.
Display the album art bitmap. More details
Use in a conditional to check if album art has been loaded
textBeforeTable: Real Time Clock Tags allowing to add a clock to your WPS. They will be empty if the time isn't set correctly. Sleep timer - Time left until stop %bs "c" if the unit is currently charging the battery (only on targets that have software charge control or monitoring) %bc "p" if the charger is connected (only on targets that can charge batteries) %bp Show estimated battery time left or -1 if no runtime data is defined in target config file %bt Show the battery level in volts %bv Show numeric battery level in percent. Can also be used in a conditional: %?bl<-1|0|1|2|...|N> where the -1 value is used when the battery level isn't known (it usually is). Can also be used as a bar (See #Bar_Tags) %bl Description Tag
textAfterTable: %cf use for a conditional for 12/24 hour format. %?cf<24 hour stuff|12 hour stuff> %cH hour (00..23) %ck hour (0..23) %cI hour (01..12) - (that's a c and an uppercase i) %cl hour (1..12) - (and this is a c and a lowercase L) %cm month (01..12) Can also be used in a conditional tag: %?cm<January|February|March|April|May|June|July|August|September|October|November|December> %cM minute (00..59) %cS second (00..60) %cy last two digits of year (00..99) %cY year (1970...) %cP upper case AM or PM indicator %cp lower case am or pm indicator %ca
